headline: FedEx to cut 480+ jobs, close facilities as part of Network 2.0 restructuring
summary: FedEx plans to eliminate more than 480 jobs between two permanent closures and three site staff reductions as part of its Network 2.0 initiative.

raw.headline: FedEx to cut 480+ jobs, close facilities as part of Network 2.0 restructuring

headline: FedEx to implement single pricing structure for express, standard pickups
summary: FedEx will soon provide a single pricing structure for parcel pickups to coincide with restructuring of Express and Ground networks into a single network. The post FedEx to implement single pricing structure for express, standard pickups appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: FedEx to implement single pricing structure for express, standard pickups
raw.summary: FedEx will soon provide a single pricing structure for parcel pickups to coincide with restructuring of Express and Ground networks into a single network. The post FedEx to implement single pricing structure for express, standard pickups appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Meta, FedEx, Oracle: Trending Tickers
summary: Meta (META) was upgraded to Hold from Underperform by Needham analyst Laura Martin, citing higher employee productivity than Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN). FedEx (FDX) was upgraded to Outperform from Underperform by BNP Paribas after the company outperformed rival UPS (UPS) in volume and yield growth. Oracle (ORCL) is expanding its cloud deal with OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) by reportedly renting out 4.5 gigawatts of data-center power to the company, according to Bloomberg. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

headline: Stocks Rally on the Stronger-Than-Expected US Payroll Report
